title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, January 29, 2022
description: It was on this day in 1845 that Edgar Allan Poe's poem "The Raven" was published in the New York Evening Mirror. Poe only earned $9 for the poem.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1845 that Edgar Allan Poe's poem "The Raven" was published in the New York Evening Mirror. Poe only earned $9 for the poem.
